val:
"""
A date-time string at UTC, such as 2007-12-03T10:15:30Z, compliant with the
`date-time` format outlined in section 5.6 of the RFC 3339 profile of the ISO
8601 standard for representation of dates and times using the Gregorian calendar.
"""
scalar DateTime

type HomePage {
  id: ID

  """Enter Homepage Title..."""
  homepageTitle: String
  howPage(locale: String): How
  _meta: PrimeDocument_Meta
}

type How {
  id: ID

  """Enter how title (pe. How)"""
  howTitle: String
  usedTechnologies: [How_usedTechnologies]
  usedServices: [How_usedServices]
  usedProcesses: [How_usedProcesses]
  _meta: PrimeDocument_Meta
}

type How_Connection {
  edges: [How_ConnectionEdge]
  pageInfo: PageInfo
  totalCount: Int
}

type How_ConnectionEdge {
  node: How
  cursor: String
}

input How_CreateInput {
  howTitle: String
  usedTechnologies: [How_usedTechnologiesCreateInput!]
  usedServices: [How_usedServicesCreateInput!]
  usedProcesses: [How_usedProcessesCreateInput!]
}

input How_Sort {
  howTitle: Order
  usedTechnologies: Order
  usedServices: Order
  usedProcesses: Order
}

input How_UpdateInput {
  howTitle: String
  usedTechnologies: [How_usedTechnologiesUpdateInput!]
  usedServices: [How_usedServicesUpdateInput!]
  usedProcesses: [How_usedProcessesUpdateInput!]
}

union How_usedProcesses = Processes | Prime_UnknownSlice

scalar How_usedProcessesCreateInput

scalar How_usedProcessesUpdateInput

union How_usedServices = Services | Prime_UnknownSlice

scalar How_usedServicesCreateInput

scalar How_usedServicesUpdateInput

union How_usedTechnologies = Technologies | Prime_UnknownSlice

scalar How_usedTechnologiesCreateInput

scalar How_usedTechnologiesUpdateInput

input How_Where {
  howTitle: PrimeField_String_Where
  OR: [How_Where]
  AND: [How_Where]
}

"""
The `JSON` scalar type represents JSON values as specified by [ECMA-404](http://www.ecma-international.org/publications/files/ECMA-ST/ECMA-404.pdf).
"""
scalar JSON

type Mutation {
  createHow(locale: String, input: How_CreateInput!): How
  updateHow(
    """Can be hashid or UUID"""
    id: ID!

    """Merge updated input (instead of replacing)"""
    merge: Boolean = true
    locale: String
    input: How_UpdateInput!
  ): How
  removeHow(
    """Accepts hashid or UUID"""
    id: ID!

    """Optional when using UUID as id"""
    locale: String
  ): Boolean
}

enum Order {
  ASC
  DESC
}

type PageInfo {
  hasNextPage: Boolean
  hasPreviousPage: Boolean
  startCursor: String
  endCursor: String
}

union Prime_Document = HomePage | How | Prime_Document_NotFound

type Prime_Document_NotFound {
  message: String
}

type Prime_UnknownSlice {
  error: String
  raw: JSON
}

type PrimeDocument_Meta {
  locale: String
  locales: [String]
  publishedAt: DateTime
  updatedAt: DateTime
  id: ID
}

input PrimeField_String_Where {
  neq: String
  eq: String
  contains: String
}

type Process {
  """Enter process title"""
  processTitle: String

  """Enter Process description"""
  processDescription: String
  processImage(crop: String): String
}

type Processes {
  """Enter processes title (pe. Processes)"""
  processesTitle: String
  usedProcess: [Processes_usedProcess]
}

union Processes_usedProcess = Process | Prime_UnknownSlice

type Query {
  HomePage(locale: String): HomePage
  How(id: ID!, locale: String): How
  allHow(locale: String, first: Int, skip: Int, before: String, after: String, sort: [How_Sort], where: [How_Where]): How_Connection
  Prime_Document(id: String, locale: String): Prime_Document
}

type Service {
  """Enter service title..."""
  serviceTitle: String

  """Enter service description..."""
  serviceDescription: String
}

type Services {
  """Enter Service title (pe. Services)"""
  serviceTitle: String
  usedServices: [Services_usedServices]
}

union Services_usedServices = Service | Prime_UnknownSlice

type Technologies {
  """Enter Technologies title"""
  title: String
  usedTechnology: [Technologies_usedTechnology]
}

union Technologies_usedTechnology = Technology | Prime_UnknownSlice

type Technology {
  """Enter technology name"""
  technologyName: String
  technologyImage(crop: String): String

  """Enter Technology description"""
  technologyDescription: String
}
